column3: We have a script to do this for all files: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/tree/d32528e733f2711b34dbc41fbb2bb0f153bf7e9a/contrib/devtools#copyright_headerpy

NACK.  I noticed that at least 3 source files have a copyright year of 2017 replaced with a new year of 2018, when they should really be extending the year 2017 to a range of "2017-2018."  (Hopefully the devtool script referenced by @MarcoFalke takes this into consideration.)

test/functional/rpc_uptime.py
test/functional/rpc_deprecated.py
test/functional/wallet_resendwallettransactions.py
I started this script and now all the years are correct.\nShould I create a new Pull Request with repaired files?
I created new Pull Request #12359 with this script.
